content: {"Name": "Karyl's Kupboard CAPTAIN Youth & Family Services", "Entity_Id": 55, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "Organization": "CAPTAIN Community Human Services ", "More_Information": "Guests can visit once a month Call during pantry hours to place phone order or visit www.captaincares.org for online order. curb side, call or ring door bell on arrival, order will be brought out", "Counties": ["Saratoga"], "Location": "Clifton Park", "Address": "5 Municipal Plaza, Suite 3", "City": "Clifton Park", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12065", "Phone": "(518) 371-1185", "Hours_of_Operation": "Mon 10-3  and 4-6pm (by appt only) Tues 10-3 Thurs 10-3", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://captaincares.org/what-we-do/emergency-assistance/emergency-food-hygiene-pantry.html", "Coalition": 1, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.8611836", "Longitude": "-73.7824106", "Last_Updated": "02-07-2024", "icon": "marker-F42000", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
